name: Aurora Vitamin C Serum
description: Brightening serum with stabilized vitamin C and alpine botanicals for luminous skin.
usage: Apply 2-3 drops after cleansing, morning and evening.

name: Rose Quartz Cream Cleanser
description: Silky cleanser that melts makeup while restoring softness.
usage: Massage onto damp skin, rinse with warm water.

name: Silk Hydration Essence
description: Weightless essence that primes and plumps with fermented botanicals.
usage: Press into skin after cleansing.

name: Midnight Repair Cream
description: Rich night cream that cushions skin with ceramides.
usage: Massage into face and neck before bed.

name: Luna Eye Concentrate
description: Cooling eye concentrate to soften fine lines.
usage: Apply a rice-sized amount under eyes.

name: Atelier Veil Foundation
description: Soft-focus foundation with breathable coverage.
usage: Blend with brush or fingertips for natural coverage.

name: Soft Veil Concealer
description: Creamy concealer that brightens without creasing.
usage: Tap under eyes or over blemishes.

name: Petal Blur Blush
description: Velvety powder blush with buildable pigment.
usage: Sweep onto cheeks for a diffused flush.

name: Luminous Halo Highlighter
description: Champagne glow highlighter with a satin finish.
usage: Apply to high points of the face.

name: Cloud Matte Lip Color
description: Weightless matte lip with velvet payoff.
usage: Swipe directly or tap for a blurred effect.

name: Silk Noir Eau de Parfum
description: Amber-wood fragrance with black tea and velvet musk.
usage: Spritz onto pulse points.

name: Citrus Atlas Eau de Parfum
description: Sparkling citrus with neroli and warm cedar.
usage: Mist onto skin or hair.

name: Velour Hand Cream
description: Fast-absorbing hand cream with botanical oils.
usage: Massage into hands as needed.

name: Clarity Clay Mask
description: Detoxifying clay mask that refines pores.
usage: Apply a thin layer, rinse after 10 minutes.

name: Dew Mist Toner
description: Hydrating mist toner for post-cleanse comfort.
usage: Mist over face and press in.

name: Radiant Sun Fluid SPF 50
description: Weightless sun fluid with satin finish.
usage: Apply generously as the last skincare step.

name: Marble Brow Pencil
description: Ultra-fine brow pencil with satin finish.
usage: Sketch hair-like strokes for definition.

name: Noir Volume Mascara
description: Buildable mascara for lifted volume.
usage: Sweep from root to tip.

name: Rosewood Lip Oil
description: Cushiony lip oil with a sheer tint.
usage: Apply alone or over lip color.

name: Silk Jasmine Hair Mist
description: Lightweight hair mist with jasmine and bergamot.
usage: Spritz on hair lengths for a soft trail.

name: Nocturne Atelier Candle
description: Smoky rose candle with a velvet finish.
usage: Trim wick and burn for 2-3 hours.

name: Vela Body Lotion
description: Silky body lotion with cashmere musk.
usage: Smooth over body after showering.

name: Atelier Glow Primer
description: Illuminating primer with a softly blurred finish.
usage: Apply before foundation for a luminous base.
